channel.title: Entrepreneurship & Business Course
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description: This audio course by Mark Juliano, an active entrepreneur, who has started 10+ companies. The course was developed as part of being an Adjunct Professor, and parallels a live course at Carnegie Mellon University taught in the MISM masters program. A website exists with PowerPoint lecture notes, handouts, cases, etc. at www.talkshoe.com/professorjuliano. Topics include idea generation, company formation, funding, writing a business plan, sales & marketing, IPOs and acquisitions, and giving an investor presentation This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Prof Mark
channel.itunes:subtitle: Entrepreneurship & Business Course
channel.itunes:summary: This audio course by Mark Juliano, an active entrepreneur, who has started 10+ companies. The course was developed as part of being an Adjunct Professor, and parallels a live course at Carnegie Mellon University taught in the MISM masters program. A website exists with PowerPoint lecture notes, handouts, cases, etc. at www.talkshoe.com/professorjuliano. Topics include idea generation, company formation, funding, writing a business plan, sales & marketing, IPOs and acquisitions, and giving an investor presentation This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:keywords: entrepreneurship, entrepreneurism, business, sales, marketing, VC, venture capital, funding, acquisition, IPO, university, masters, professor, Carnegie, Mellon, juliano
